title: FPS Help.
body:
Hello Boards!Well guys could you help me? Im having issues with fps since three,four months and i cant get with it anymore.Well i fucked up somehow my old pc windows 10 home i was having on him 60 fps smooth then all happends i downgraded to windows 7 and my fps were becoming so laggy same as my pc.Then i upgraded back again with w10 PRO and im having still this isuses im crying literally i am 4yrs old league player didnt played 5 month bcs of pc  could you help me thanks? I planned to  buy new processor cuz i think my is bad my processor got 1.80ghz. Here are my pc specs:
Intel(R) Pentium(R) Dual CPU E2160 @1,80ghz  
Installed memory (RAM)  2GIGABYTES
SYSTEM TYPE : 64-BIT OPERATING SYSTEM,X64 BASED PROCESSOR 
Would new procesor help me? I tried Riot FPS Guide and it didnt work i tried Advanced System Settings in computer nope nothing helps!!!!
I GOT ALSO AMD 6450 GRAPHIC CARD 
 My fps is droping at 25-15 
GUYS WOULD BUYING NEW PROCESSOR/GRAPHIC HELP ME?

replies.body:
I was checking the [**minimum specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654#section-windows), and it seems like that processor might not be hitting the recommended specs which might be related.

https://i.gyazo.com/c772e24dae841ee002a5135d5d9f7e2f.png
